Name: Christmas Market
LongDescription:
🎄✨ Join us at the Christmas Market at the Cultural Center in Nowa Dęba! 🎅🎶

Enjoy the festive magic, special performances, and attractions for the whole family! 🌟🎁

📅 Event Program:

Wednesday, December 18th
🕕 6:00 PM – Outdoor Christmas Concert: performance by the Brass Orchestra of Nowa Dęba and competitions hosted by Rybka 2.0 Restaurant 🎷🎶

Friday, December 20th
🎭 4:00 PM – "The Star of Fulfilled Dreams" with Krasnal Preschool ✨
🕕 6:00 PM – Christmas Party with DJ Randy! 🎧🎉

Saturday, December 21st
🤹‍♂️ 2:00 PM – Spectacular circus show "Rupherth and Rico" 🤡
🎅 Christmas concert and fun for kids: lights, games, competitions, and sparklers! 🎁🎄

Sunday, December 22nd
🎤 2:30 PM – Christmas concert by the SingSOK vocal group 🎶
🕯️ 3:00 PM – Passing of the Bethlehem Light of Peace 🌟
🎵 3:30 PM – Concert by the school choir 🌟

🎁 Christmas stalls offering festive goods will be open:
📌 Friday: 2:00–7:00 PM
📌 Sunday: 1:00–6:00 PM

Don’t miss this magical event – feel the Christmas spirit and spend this special time with your loved ones! 🌟🎄🎶

Description:

Battery change:

📱 Sale of electronics and accessories:
We offer the latest electronics and high -quality accessories for your devices.

Trust the experts! In VrGsm we provide quick and effective repair using the latest technologies. Visit us and see how we can restore the full functionality of your devices.

Name: Your ad in mCity
Description: If you'd like your ad to appear on the mCity home page, let us know! There are only 3 spots available.
EnglishSprechen: You can post also in English!
